backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing contact forms and courses with add, fetch, and sorted list query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two UI header-related features and their associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend fileâ€™s purpose across pages, components, hooks, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens, dark mode overrides, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with meta tags, favicon, and script loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with Layout and routes for Home, About, Courses, and Contact pages.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout component providing header, responsive navigation, branding, CTA buttons, mobile menu, and outlet rendering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing authenticated/anonymous backend actors with query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching courses, submitting contact forms, and retrieving contact form data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, light/dark theme CSS variables, and custom brand color utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with hero, vision, and mission sections using styled cards and brand colors.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact page with a form, validation, scroll handling, and contact info cards.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Displays course offerings in structured card sections with enroll buttons navigating to contact page.
frontend/src/pages/FacultyPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the Faculty page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page containing hero content, program highlights, and value propositions with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the Results page.
frontend/src/pages/WhyChooseUsPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the Why Choose Us page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, custom colors tied to CSS variables, plugins, and extended styles.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, known header styling issues, and feature requests for fixing company name wrapping and color. Includes existing features, pending requests, and project configuration fields.
